ERROR_INVALID_REQUEST: The request was rejected by the server.
ERROR_NAME_IN_USE: This username is already in use.
ERROR_REGISTRATION_DISABLED: Registration is disabled at this time.
ERROR_REQUESTS_LIMIT_REACHED: Maximum request limit has been reached. Try again later.
ERROR_TIMEOUT: Server is not responding. Timeout reached.
ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_VERSION: The server is not supported by this client.
GAMES_NEED_DECK: You must prepare a valid deck before starting a game
GAMES_PLAY_SUPPORTER_FIRST_TURN: Allow Supporters to be played on turn 1.
MAIN_LEAVE_GAME: Are you sure you want to leave?
MESSAGES_DELETE_CONVERSATION_CONFIRM: Are you sure you would like to delete this message? This cannot be reversed.
PROFILE_CHANGE_EMAIL_HINT: This e-mail address can be used to recover your password.
PROMPT_INVITE_NO_DECK: You must prepare a valid deck before accepting the invitation.
REGISTER_EMAIL_HINT: You will be able to use this e-mail to recover your password.
REGISTER_EMAIL_TAKEN: This e-mail is already in use
REGISTER_NAME_HINT: Other players will see this unique name in-game. Please use at least 6 alphanumeric characters.
REGISTER_NAME_TAKEN: This name is already in use.
REGISTER_SUCCESS: Your account has successfully been created. You may use your credentials to sign in.
RESET_PASSWORD_CANNOT_SEND_EMAIL: We could not send an e-mail to the provided address.
RESET_PASSWORD_EMAIL_HINT: Please specify your account e-mail address.
RESET_PASSWORD_EMAIL_NOT_EXISTS: The e-mail address does not exist in our database.
RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: We have sent an e-mail to your e-mail address with the instructions of how to change your password.
SET_PASSWORD_INVALID_TOKEN: Token for password change is invalid or has expired.
SET_PASSWORD_NEW_HINT: Must be at least 6 characters including at least one numeric character.
VALIDATION_INVALID_ADDRESS: This is not a valid server address.
VALIDATION_INVALID_DECK_FILE: The deck file could not be loaded.
VALIDATION_INVALID_EMAIL_FORMAT: This is not a valid e-mail address.
VALIDATION_INVALID_IMAGE: The selected image file type is not supported.
VALIDATION_INVALID_NAME_FORMAT: This is not a valid name.
VALIDATION_INVALID_NUMBER: This is not a valid number.
VALIDATION_INVALID_PASSWORD_FORMAT: This is not a valid password.
VALIDATION_INVALID_REPLAY: The replay file could not be loaded.
VALIDATION_NAME_ALREADY_IN_USE: This username is already in use.

GAME_MESSAGES.CANNOT_USE_STADIUM: You can't use this stadium card right now.

GAME_MESSAGES.CHOOSE_ONE_ITEM_AND_ONE_LIGHTNING_ENERGY: Choose one Item and one [L] Energy to put in your hand.

GAME_MESSAGES.ENERGY_ALREADY_ATTACHED: An energy card was already attached this turn.

GAME_LOGS.LOG_BANNED_BY_ARBITER: {{name}} made an invalid move multiple times and was banned by the arbiter.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_FLIP_ASLEEP: {{name}} flips a coin for Status Condition: Asleep.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_ABILITY_BLOCKS_DAMGE: {{ name }} prevents damage with {{ pokemon }}'s ability.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_FLIP_CONFUSION: {{name}} a coin for Status Condition: Confusion.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_GAME_FINISHED_BEFORE_STARTED: Game finished before it has started.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_PLAYER_DISABLES_ITEMS_UNTIL_END_OF_N: {{name}} disables items until the end of the opponent's next turn with {{ attack }}.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_PLAYER_DISABLES_SUPPORTERS_UNTIL_END: {{name}} disables supporters until the end of the opponent's next turn {{ attack }}.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_PLAYER_NO_CARDS_IN_DECK: {{name}} has no more cards in their deck.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_PLAYER_NO_PRIZE_CARD: {{name}} has no more Prize cards left.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_PLAYER_PLACES_DAMAGE_COUNTERS: {{ name }} places {{ damage }} on {{ target }} with {{ effect }}.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_PLAYER_RETURNS_TO_DECK_FROM_DISCARD: {{name}} returns {{card}} from their Discard Pile into their Deck.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_SETUP_NO_BASIC_POKEMON: {{name}} has no basic Pokemon in the hand.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_STARTS_BECAUSE_OF_ABILITY: {{name}} starts the game because of {{ability}} ability.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_PLAYER_PUTS_CARD_ON_BOTTOM_OF_DECK: {{ name }} puts {{ card }} on the bottom of their deck.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_PLAYER_DISCARDS_WITH_FIELD_BLOWER: {{name}} discards {{card}} from the field with field blower.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_DISCARD_STADIUM_CHAOTIC_SWELL: {{name}} discards {{card}} as a result of Chaotic Swell.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_PLAYER_PUTS_CARD_IN_LOST_ZONE: {{name}} puts {{card}} in the lost zone from their hand.
GAME_LOGS.LOG_HISUIAN_HEAVY_BALL: {{name}} has taken {{card}} from their Prize Cards with Hisuian Heavy Ball.
